definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)

sentences.english: The flip pass is necessary during a close exchange of the ball.
sentences.chinese: 在近距離換球時，短傳是很必要的。

sentences.english: They play with a congested midfield and with a lot of short passing on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 他們中場人數衆多，以大量的地面短傳相互呼應。

sentences.english: And also short pass, overhead pass.
You see Spain's tiki-taka is beyond reproach simply because they are Spain.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙的短傳滲透無可指責，因爲他們是西班牙。
